channel.title: For those who know Java quite well, I need a little help
channel.description:
Hi. My server has nulls. They're quite bad. Source: HIGHLY modified Cheezscape78 (PvpScape) Heres the deal, I start the server, and if someone is attempting a connection, I get this null: [code]Starting Enkrona on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.NullPointerException at server.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code] Now, when I don't get that, my server will not allow two people to connect simultaneously. I get [code]ClientHandler: Accepted from (ip)[/code] Then they do not log in, and they spam this, thus creating nulls, thus crashing my server. If everyone can get on my server fine, they will play for around 20 minutes, the I get another null that crashes the server. Can this be fixed? Or is my server doomed?
Modified reply: Please help? No? :'(
Aww.. :( At least reply..[br][size=1]Posted on: January 20, 2007, 05:49:59 PM[/size][hr]Someone please help..

redownload source AND START ALL OVER

item.title: For those who know Java quite well, I need a little help
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Since it says “Unknown source” instead of the line number the problem originated on, then you can’t fix it. So until you get it to give a proper error, your screwed.

Read full topic

item.title: For those who know Java quite well, I need a little help
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Hi.
My server has nulls.
They’re quite bad.
Source: HIGHLY modified Cheezscape78 (PvpScape)
Heres the deal, I start the server, and if someone is attempting a connection, I get this null: Starting Enkrona on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.NullPointerException at server.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Now, when I don’t get that, my server will not allow two people to connect simultaneously. I get ClientHandler: Accepted from (ip)
Then they do not log in, and they spam this, thus creating nulls, thus crashing my server. If everyone can get on my server fine, they will play for around 20 minutes, the I get another null that crashes the server.
Can this be fixed? Or is my server doomed?

Modified reply:
Please help? No? :’(

Aww…
At least reply…[br][size=1]Posted on: January 20, 2007, 05:49:59 PM[/size][hr]Someone please help…

Read full topic
